#summary Installing Android SDK and using Eclipse

= Introduction =

http://developer.android.com/sdk/index.html


== Installing Details ==
  # Download and install Android SDK from above
  # Run Android SDK manager
  # Download Android 2.2 and Google API revision 8
  # Go to Eclipse->Help->Install New Software
    # https://dl-ssl.google.com/android/eclipse/ for Eclipse ADT Plugin
    # http://keytool.sourceforge.net/update for Keytool
  
== Android Projects ==
  # New->Project->Android Project
  # Name, package, activity
